subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Islam in America
description: A short lesson to help you apply Islam in America.

hook.text: Islam arrived in America on slave ships. Today, 3.5 million American Muslims are redefining what the faith looks like.

buildup.text: Up to 30% of enslaved Africans were Muslim. Their faith was systematically erased. Islam in America has deep roots.

discovery.text: The Nation of Islam attracted Black Americans in the 20th century. Malcolm X later embraced orthodox Sunni Islam.

twist.text: Today, American Muslims are the most diverse Muslim community on Earth: Black, Arab, South Asian, and white converts.

climax.text: American Islam is creating something new: a faith shaped by democracy, diversity, and the immigrant experience.

punchline.text: Islam came to America on slave ships. It stayed and reinvented itself.

quiz.question: How did Islam first arrive in America?
options: With enslaved Africans, up to 30% of whom were Muslim
